Liabilities, Current [Abstract]
Current content liabilities
Content Liabilities, Current

Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of content liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for content received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).
